name: MYTOZ
description:
A free smartphone loaded with free calls, messaging and free surf powered by relevant advertising favouring both advertisers and consumers. The Mytoz phone is an Android phone having all functions of standard phones plus the ability to push messages to the start screen when activating the phone and before unlocking it.
We will also build a MVNO a issue own free SIM-cards.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Rolf Lundqvist
team.bioHtml: Founder of Mytoz. Director at IKEA, H&M, Gap, Banana Republic, Ricci Casa. Expert in retail and expansion. Specialized in furniture, furnishing and fashion.

team.name: Ian Petras
team.bioHtml: A senior marketing professional across SMEs, large FTSE100 and high-growth start-ups alike. Founder of several ventures but looking for the next challenge.

jobs.title: Co-owner/Co-funder
jobs.description:
We are looking for an international co-owner who can help us take Mytoz from a start-up to a unicorn.
You have experience with funding, international growth, digital marketing, social media and much more.
You should also have some funds yourself to invest in the company.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are looking for an international co-owner who can help us take Mytoz from a start-up to a unicorn.
You have experience with funding, international growth, digital marketing, social media and much more.
You should also have some funds yourself to invest in the company.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Apprentice
jobs.description:
Digital Marketing Apprentice

Do you want to take the first steps towards starting a career in Marketing, Advertising and Web Development?

We are thrilled to be recruiting for a Digital Marketing Executive Apprentice to join our team in London and Stockholm, initially on a remote basis.

Why choose an apprenticeship?
Apprenticeships are a great way to get the qualifications and experience needed to start your career. Combining technical training with work experience, becoming an apprentice is the first step to a recognised career path. The digital sector will only continue to grow and an apprenticeship with MYTOZ will enable you to join this diverse, fast-moving and exciting industry, putting you at the forefront of tomorrow's world. If you're ready to earn more, start your apprenticeship with MYTOZ today, apply below.

About the Employer
Established in 2015, MYTOZ are an international company who provide an alternative to mainstream consumer telecommunications and advertising. We aim to change the mobile communications market as well as the mobile advertising landscape and to help businesses to expand. MYTOZ are looking for a motivated and creative individual to join the team as a Digital Marketing Apprentice.

MYTOZ is a start-up and relies on investor capital until profitability. For this reason, the internship will not be paid initially.

Tasks to be trained in
The Digital Marketing Apprentice will administer the company's social media marketing and advertising.
* Create and publish relevant, original and high-quality content.
* Identify development aspects that would improve content.
* Create a regular publishing schedule on social media.
* Create a calendar that manages content and plans specific timely marketing campaigns.
* Promote content through social advertising.

Training to be provided
Course Content:
The modules you will complete as part of this apprenticeship are:
* Facebook Blueprint
* Google Digital Garage
* What is Social? - Northwestern University
* Hubspot Content Marketing

All courses include a final exam and come with a certification. Details of these courses and their completion methods are prone to change, as well as the removal or entry of new courses as the company sees fit during your tenure.

Skills Required
* Creative individual
* A basic understanding of digital marketing
* Good creative writing skills
* Ability to contribute fresh new ideas
* Hardworking and keen to learn

We're always looking for enthusiastic people to add to our talent pool: at MYTOZ, we believe people are more than a list of skills, so even if you don't feel like you tick every box - get in touch with us!
Our apprenticeships will teach you all the skills you need to succeed anyway!

Salary, Hours, Benefits
* This internship is without pay but shall be converted to full market rate pay and a permanent position after the first few funding rounds.
* Remote working. Set your own hours.
* Opportunity to attend client meetings
* Extra training opportunities
* Fully funded company events
* Supportive environment

There are career progression opportunities available upon completion of the programme.

Location & Travel
MYTOZ is split across the European continent between HQ, Marketing and IT. You can choose to relocate to Stockholm or London or choose to work remotely instead.

Eligibility 
A residency eligibility applies to this vacancy. You must be a British, Swedish or European Economic Area (EEA) citizen and have been resident in the UK, Sweden or any other EEA country for the past 3 years.

jobs.title: Full Stack Develper
jobs.description:
You shall take the existing Mytoz Android app, backend and frontend systems to the next level. All systems are made in Java.

We have to work step by step, but with your help, we will recruit more users every day as the app gets more and more interesting and attractive.

This is a non-paid position, but after showing success, you will get shares in the company (up to 5% in the first stage and if it shows you are a competent CTO, you can get up to 10% of the company shares.

You must know to develop both backends, android apps and internet sites.

You should have experience with Ad Server connections and if you also know about Drop Shipping services even better.

Even though this is a non-paid position in the beginning, we can discuss paying some small success fee when you have successfully added important functions to the app/backend/panels/shop etc.
